properties.description: A range of community events, detailed in the opening times. Co-ordinator Nic is also at the village hall Mon-Thur 8.30-2.30- there is a room available at the village hall if anyone wants to pop in for a brew! Homestart Pre School Group. We offer families, warm space, hot refreshments and food for the children. Thursday 09:30 - 11:00
